name: Shin Megami Tensei Connection
description:
-What is Shin Megami Tensei Connection?-

It's a #RPG based mostly on #ShinMegaimiTenseiNocturne and #Persona5 made in #RPGMakerMV, a game where the characters from both games crosses their fates in the vast Vortex World where the their struggle against the demons will take place.

-Plot-

The player as Joker from Persona 5 alongside of the rest of the Phantom Thieves struggle in the Vortex World where everyone is against them with a only few exceptions. They will fight their way out of this dangerous place while the most rational beings are trying to obtain their Reasons to archieve their ultimate goal that will decide the fate of this world.

-Same places, New dangers-

You may find yourself following a familiar path like someone else, but the Vortex World is unpredictable and so are the new dangers that will make sure that the player gets a different experience from the original PS2 game.

-Fuse new demons-

Fuse new personas from Nocturne and others that may have never appeared before in either Persona 5 or Nocturne, with the news personas will they will be able to help you on defeating your enemies with their own skills and use them to exploit the demon's weaknesses.

-New dialogue-

Souls and #demons sometimes will have something different to their original counterparts.

-New party members-

As you progress in the story. you will be able to meet two new powerful characters to join your party.

-More new content will come eventually-
